contextId.information: A cubit is a unit of measurement equal to about 46 centimeters. AT: "about 92 centimeters" or "about 1 meter" (See: [[:en:ta:vol2:translate:translate_bdistance]] and  [[:en:ta:vol2:translate:translate_numbers]])
"2,000 cubits." A cubit is 46 centimeters. (See: [[:en:ta:vol2:translate:translate_bdistance]] and [[:en:ta:vol2:translate:translate_numbers]])
